title: Hydrothermal Liquefaction of Different Waste Biomass using Green Solvent 2-Methyltetrahydrofuran as Extractant and Co-Solvent

Hydrothermal processes, such as hydrothermal liquefaction (HTL), are widely used for converting biomass into fuel and chemicals using superheated water as the processing medium. However, conventional organic solvents are often...
